original_title: A/L paper marking to be completed before end June: Minister
original_body_lines: Claiming that the marking of the GCE A/L examination - 2022 answer scripts has fully commenced by now, Education Minister Susil Premajayantha said today the marking of answer scripts would be completed before the end of June.
He told Parliament that the control marking of all 63 subjects has been completed by now and that the marking of answer scripts of twelve subjects has also been completed.

The Minister said the Federation of University Teachers' Association (FUTA) was fully engaged in the paper marking process and that all arrangements have been made to commence the GCE (O/L) examinations as scheduled. (Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
